mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_PRODUCTS (P_ID, P_NAME, P_TYPE, P_CATEGORY, PRICE, STOCK, S_IMAGE, L_IMAGE, P_PICK) VALUES (P_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{p_name}, #{p_type}, #{p_category}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{s_image}, #{l_image}, #{p_pick})
mapper.select: SELECT P_ID, P_NAME, P_TYPE, P_CATEGORY, PRICE, STOCK, S_IMAGE, L_IMAGE FROM STORE_PRODUCTS
